description:
Fire and the others continue practicing Oreca battles at the bowling alley when Pandora shows Fire a scene from the Oreca realm where Swordsman Dante and Fallen King Saliel are battling.  Fire becomes enraged after watching Saliel fight unfairly.  Pandora introduces Fire and the others into Dante and Saliel’s battle!  However, Fire struggles with Saliel’s unmatched strength!
Source: crunchyroll
